column4: I'm trying to get around hal errors when hoary install finishes online after initial cd install. Can you just upgrade Warty direct to Breezy, or do you have to upgrade from Hoary?
can you upgrade Warty to Breezy, or only from Hoary?
topyli....when hoary finishes the initial cd install, reboots and finishes online....I get these hal errors. Can I go to Breezy right after the initial cd install?
would be easyest to just download breezy .iso and install clean
